metadata.title: Adam Schiff forms legal defense fund to prepare for Trump attacks

left: Senator Adam Schiff formed a legal defense fund on August 15 to counter investigations from the Trump administration regarding allegations of mortgage fraud, which he denies.
Donald Trump has accused Schiff of committing mortgage fraud, particularly concerning a refinancing in 2009, a claim Schiff contests as false and politically motivated.
Schiff stated that the allegations against him are 'transparently false, stale, and long debunked,' emphasizing he will continue to hold Trump accountable despite the investigations.
Trump has referred to Schiff as 'shifty' and a 'scam artist,' aiming to discredit him amid ongoing legal and political battles.
center: Senator Adam Schiff formed a legal defense fund on August 15 to counter investigations from the Trump administration regarding allegations of mortgage fraud, which he denies.
Donald Trump has accused Schiff of committing mortgage fraud, particularly concerning a refinancing in 2009, a claim Schiff contests as false and politically motivated.
Schiff stated that the allegations against him are 'transparently false, stale, and long debunked,' emphasizing he will continue to hold Trump accountable despite the investigations.
Trump has referred to Schiff as 'shifty' and a 'scam artist,' aiming to discredit him amid ongoing legal and political battles.
right: Democratic Senator Adam Schiff of California has formed a legal defense fund in response to a Department of Justice investigation into allegations of mortgage fraud involving his Maryland property.
President Donald Trump has publicly criticized Schiff, claiming he may be guilty of mortgage fraud and that he designated the Maryland property as his primary home to evade taxes.
Schiff has denied the fraud allegations, stating that the investigation is a baseless attempt at political retribution and asserting his commitment to accountability.
A spokesperson for Schiff remarked that the accusations are absolutely and categorically false while the investigation continues.
